before_you_remove: before you remove yourself from the account.

details.p1: Account owners receive essential emails with information about the authorised agent account.
details.p2: They must make sure the authorised agent complies with its legal responsibilities. This includes telling us about any changes to the agent's information within 14 days.
details.p3_end: for more information about the legal responsibilities.

p1: Authorised agents must have at least one account owner.
page_header: You need to add an account owner
why_authorised_agents_must: Why authorised agents must have an account owner
you_need_to_add: You need to add an account owner to
